summary:
This mod is standalone and changes Vanilla, Dawnguard, Herthfire, Dragonborn femele NPCs. When you introduce this mod, other mods are not necessary.
**** If you install the mod using NMM, it gives option to install all at once or individually. ****
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/seCmE90.png?1[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/0XFF46b.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/GVlzXP4.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=3pt][color=red]This mod is standalone and changes Face / Body / Outfits / AI for Serana, Lydia, Iona, Jordis, Rayya, Aranea, Brelyna, Camilla, Muiri, and Lisette, Mjoll, Valerica, Ysolda, Ingjard, Beleval, Sorine, Frea, Delphine, Elisif.
You can't change any other. [/color][/size]

[size=6pt][color=yellow]If you install the mod using NMM, it gives option to install all at once or individually.[/color][/size]

[size=3pt][color=red]When you introduce this mod, other mods are not necessary.[/color][/size]
[size=3pt][color=red]Skyrim version has to be 1.9.32.0 or higher.[/color][/size]
[size=3pt][color=yellow]!! Dawnguard / Hearthfire / Dragonborn required !! [/color][/size]


[color=yellow]* NOTICE *[/color]
Please try doing console command "Setnpcweight (Default value)" about NPCs neek seem.
1. Open console, targeting NPC by clicking her
2. Type "setnpcweight xxx"
3. Type "disable" and "enable"
4. Save game and load, done.
To verify, check the contents of README.


[size=3pt][color=#669933]Version Information:[/color][/size]
2014.4.20 V1.0 Initial version
2014.4.23 uploaded Patch for Muiri's bug
2014.4.26 uploaded Patch for Serana's outfit issue(naked) (Rev1.1)
2014.4.29 add Valerica Beta
2014.5.11 V1.1 Released
・Lisette, Mjoll, Valerica, Ysolda and Serana's new modeling added
・Fixed Muiri's and Serana's (Naked) bug.
2014.5.26 V1.2 Released
・Beleval, Ingjard, Sorine, Frea added
・Fixed Ysolda's bug and NPCs default weight fixed(for neck seem)
[size=3pt][color=red]2014.7.14 V1.3 Released[/color][/size]
・Delphine, Elisif added
・Camilla's neck semm fixed
・Serana's new modeling added (Evil ver.)

[size=3pt][color=#669933]Profile / Whereabouts:[/color][/size]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/cdRsgku.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=3pt][color=#669933]Installation :[/color][/size]
Please do CLEAN INSTALL and LOAD ORDER optimization.
[NMM]
Download via NMM or drag the archive into NMM and activate.
Simple and easy to implement in Fomod.　

[Manual]　*I hardly recommended*
Unpack the archive and copy the contents into your Skyrim install folder, and activate in Data Files when loading Skyrim.
[color=red]Step.1 Copy to your Data Folder from 00_Main - 00_All or 01_IND - meshes & textures & BTRH_xxx.esp flies.[/color]
[color=red]Step.2 Copy to Data - Meshes & Textures - actors - character - btrh
from 02_Options(Choose which Body Type you want to use) body meshes and textures.[/color]

[size=3pt][color=#669933]Uninstallation :[/color][/size]
Dismiss them from your active followers.
[NMM]
Deactivate the mod in NMM and delete.
[Manual]
In your Skyrim Data directory, delete the following files & folders.

[size=3pt][color=#669933]Recommended Mods :[/color][/size]
・Follower and NPC overhaul mods
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933/?]EFF[/url] by Expired
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288
・For Serana
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28685/?]Marriable Serana[/url] by C0drm0nk33
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28147/?]zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods with hairs[/url] by zzjay and Grace Darkling
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51947/?]EotW Dawnguard DLC Textures Remastered[/url] by EcthelionOtW and misslexi
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23557/?]Serana - Remove Hood[/url] by SONNYSPAK


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/NFKMY0r.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=3pt][color=#669933]Used mods :[/color][/size]

[size=3pt][color=#669933]Spcial thanks:[/color][/size]
You have helped me greatly. I appreciate your assistance indeed.
Thank you very much, mate!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2650523/?]rxkx22[/url]


And any freinds :)
I sincerely appreciate all of you. Thank you.

[size=3pt][b][color=pink]On a final note, Your suggestions & inquiries and their screenshots are always welcome![/color][/b][/size]
And, Please check out [url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/btrh1979/]MY Flickr[/url] when you get a chance.
Enjoy.　Serana is mai waifu!
BTRH'79
